headline: This Critical AI Stock Is Now Building Factories in the U.S.
summary: In the high tech universe, there is only a single common road that Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD), Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL), Qualcomm (NASDAQ: QCOM), Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO) and many others must go to get their chips made, no matter where they hail from. That road inevitably leads to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Ltd. ... This Critical AI Stock Is Now Building Factories in the U.S.

headline: AI could see 'incremental' moves to profitability in 2026, 2027
summary: TECHnalysis Research, LLC president Bob O'Donnell expands upon where artificial intelligence could begin to become profitable over the next two years. Also hear Bob O'Donnell explain how companies are investing in "hybrid AI." To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: A Look at AMD's Valuation After Bold AI Growth Targets and Analyst Day Optimism
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) shares gained attention after its Financial Analyst Day, where the company set ambitious multi-year growth goals. CEO Lisa Su emphasized that accelerating AI demand will drive annual revenue growth above 35 percent over the next few years. See our latest analysis for Advanced Micro Devices.
